Verses: 1 thiralaana Aisuvariyaththaippaarkakilum Narkeerththiye Therindhukollappadaththakkadhu; Pon Velliyaippaarkkilum Dhayaiye Nalam.
2 aisuvariyavaanum Thariththiranum Oruvaraiyoruvar Sandhikkiraargal; Avargal Anaivaraiyum Undaakkinavar Karththar.
3 vivegi Aabaththaik Kandu Maraindhukollugiraan; Pedhaigal Nedugappoi Thandikkappadugiraargal.
4 thaazhmaikkum Karththarukku Bayappadudhalukkum Varum Balan Aisuvariyamum Magimaiyum Jeevanumaam.
5 maarupaadullavanudaiya Vazhiyile Mullugalum Kannigalumundu; Than Aaththumaavaik Kaakkiravan Avaigalukkuth Dhooramaai Vilagippovaan.
6 pillaiyaanavan Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyile Avanai Nadaththu; Avan Mudhirvayadhilum Adhai Vidaadhiruppaan.
7 aisuvariyavaan Thariththiranai Aalugiraan; Kadan Vaanginavan Kadan Koduththavanukku Adimai.
8 aniyaayaththai Vidhaikkiravan Varuththaththai Aruppaan; Avan Ukkiraththin Milaaru Ozhiyum.
9 karunaikkannan Aaseervadhikkappaduvaan; Avan Than Aagaaraththil Thariththiranukkuk Kodukkiraan.
10 pariyaasakkaaranaith Thuraththividu; Appozhudhu Vaadhu Neengum, Virodhamum Avamaanamum Ozhiyum.
11 suththa Irudhayaththai Virumbugiravanudaiya Udhadugal Inimaiyaanavaigal; Raajaa Avanukku Snegidhanaavaan.
12 karththarudaiya Kangal Gnaanaththaik Kaakkum; Dhrogigalin Vaarththaigalaiyo Avar Thaarumaaraakkugiraar.
13 veliyile Singam, Veedhiyile Kolaiyunben Endru Somberi Solluvaan.
14 parasthreegalin Vaai Aazhamaana Padukuzhi; Karththarudaiya Kobaththirku Edhuvaanavan Adhile Vizhuvaan.
15 pillaiyin Nenjil Madhiyeenam Ottiyirukkum; Adhaith Dhandanaiyin Pirambu Avanaivittu Agatrum.
16 thanakku Adhigam Undaaga Thariththiranai Odukkugiravan Thanakkuk Kuraichchalundaagave Aisuvariyavaanukkuk Koduppaan.
17 un Seviyai Saaiththu, Gnaanigaludaiya Vaarththaigalaik Kettu, En Podhagaththai Un Irudhayaththil Vai.
18 avaigalai Un Ullaththil Kaaththu, Avaigalai Un Udhadugalil Nilaiththirukkappannumbodhu, Adhu Inbamaayirukkum.
19 un Nambikkai Karththarmel Irukkumpadi, Indraiyadhinam Avaigalai Unakkuth Theriyappaduththugiren.
20 saththiya Vaarththaigalin Yadhaarththaththai Naan Unakkuth Therivikkumpadikkum, Nee Unnai Anuppinavargalukku Saththiya Vaarththaigalai Marumozhiyaaga Sollumpadikkum,
21 aalosanaiyaiyum Gnaanaththaiyumpatri Naan Unakku Mukkiyamaanavaigalai Ezhudhavillaiyaa?
22 ezhaiyaayirukkiraan Endru Ezhaiyaik Kollaiyidaadhe; Sirumaiyaanavanai Niyaayasthalaththil Ubaththiravappaduththaadhe.
23 karththar Avargalukkaaga Vazhakkaadi, Avargalaik Kollaiyidugiravargaludaiya Praananaik Kollaiyiduvaar.
24 kobakkaaranukkuth Thozhanaagaadhe; Ukkiramulla Manushanode Nadavaadhe.
25 appadi Seydhaal, Nee Avanudaiya Vazhigalaik Katrukkondu, Un Aaththumaavukkuk Kanniyai Varuvippaai.
26 kaiyadiththu Udanpattu, Kadanukkaagap Pinaippadugiravargalil Oruvanaagaadhe.
27 seluththa Unakku Ondrumillaadhirundhaal, Nee Paduththirukkum Padukkaiyaiyum Avan Eduththukkollavendiyadhaagume.
28 un Pidhaakkal Naattina Poorva Ellaikkuriyai Maatraadhe.
29 than Velaiyil Jaakkiradhaiyaayirukkiravanai Nee Kandaal, Avan Neesarukku Munbaaga Nillaamal, Raajaakkalukku Munbaaga Nirpaan.
